name: Diggy Diggy Dwarf 2: Deeper & Deeper
description:
The Chronicles of Bill the Dwarf Continues. Command A Crew of Dwarfs Operating the Great Machine - in order to dig deeper into the ground, Collect Diamonds and Survive. As the Great Machine digs into the earth, the story of Bill unfolds. Play to see how the story ends!

Small gif showing the game introduction: https://i.imgur.com/cdK3S8Z.gifv
